name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Street — Save money on sneakers.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the internet's best deals on sneakers and menswear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Street automatically finds listings similar to the item you’re browsing, for less. You can check out deals across the web all in one place. No more tab overload.

🚀 To use Easy Street, simply add it to your Chrome browser and start shopping! The Easy Street icon will pop-up when we find similar products across the web.

🚨 Heads Up:
1. Easy Street is still in beta and we are working to improve our results all the time. Currently, we're optimized for most sneaker brands and e-commerce sites.
2. If you don’t see the Easy Street icon pop-up when you land on a product page, it’s because there weren’t alternative listings found or the product isn't from a supported site.
3. If you see irrelevant results, let us know! We’re working hard to improve the relevance of our results, but it’s a work in progress. Your feedback helps! 

🗣️ Need to Holler?
Got a suggestion? Found a bug? Just want to say hey? We're all ears. Reach out through our website or drop a line to pedram@theeasystreet.co.
